index.title: Home
index.description: I'm Creeperkatze, a Unity game developer from Germany, with my current big project being Superslide. Currently also stumbling into web development.
index.welcome:
A Unity game developer from Germany, with my current big project being Superslide.
This website is still in early developement, and will change drastically over time.

idiot_test.title: Idiot Test
idiot_test.description: Test whether you're an idiot with these crazy and tricky questions!
idiot_test.text:
Have you ever wondered whether you're an idiot? Then you've come to the right place! Answer all 25 questions in this online idiot test to get your result! 
But beware: not all solutions are as simple as they may seem.

description.0: You somehow managed to answer hardly any questions correctly...
description.1: Well... You're not an idiot, but you can do better!
description.2: Not bad at all! A pretty... average score.
description.3: Ok, ok, not bad... But you're still not a genius.
description.4: You answered ALL the questions correctly... Respect!

error.404: Even this cute cat couldn't find the page you were looking for ;(
